name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create. | a customizable new tab page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab page with a customizable canvas that will remind you what our purpose is: to Create.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create. gives you a blank canvas every time you open a new tab. Just click, and a random color will populate the screen. Make your tab beautiful :)
